738690.name: Balance of Kingdoms
738690.description:
Balance of Kingdoms is about building, balancing and battling, combining elements of strategy and physics. Players must build a kingdom balanced on top of a beam while trying to defeat their opponent.

Build

Build your Kingdom with limited resources and prepare for battle or test yourself with a series of Build Challenges.

Balance

Be careful where you place your buildings! Your Kingdom is on top of a beam which will need to be kept balance! In a battle you can use this to your advantage and attempt to unbalance your opponent's town!

Battle

Test your building and balancing skills against an opponent. Just watch out for their cannon fire!

Singleplayer

See how long your Kingdom can last in the Survival mode or build without any time or gold limits in Freebuild mode.
After early access each Kingdom will have their own singleplayer campaign and story.
